p: Many publications from the last 20 years contain the 4 terms nanoencapsulation, nanoemulsion, nanoparticle, and nanotechnology (Fig. 1). However, before the 2000s, articles containing these four terms regarding the research in oil and food applications initiated in the late 1990s constituted less than 2% of the examined publications, making this topic a small sector of nanotechnology (Fig. 1).
